prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Chromatic Percussion, Guitar, Strings, Bass, Piano, Drums, but without Synth Lead.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Drums, Chromatic Percussion, Bass, Strings, Guitar, and Piano, but no Synth Lead.

Style 2:
This song is comprised of Piano, Guitar, Strings, Bass, Chromatic Percussion, and Drums, but no Synth Lead.

Style 3:
This composition includes Chromatic Percussion, Guitar, Strings, Bass, Piano, and Drums, omitting the Synth Lead
